summary: A highly skilled graphics programmer with experience in Rust, WebGPU, and real-time rendering. Passionate about creating visually stunning and interactive experiences.

experience.title: Senior Graphics Engineer
experience.description: Led the development of a new real-time rendering engine using WebGPU. Focused on shader optimization and advanced lighting techniques.

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer
